titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 2010 Special Olympics USA National Games.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/20/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Applauds the participants and coaches of the 2010 Special Olympics USA National Games, the volunteers and law enforcement officers who support the Games, and the people who contributed to the Games.
